snippet: Compression tights are beginning to come into vogue among stylish women who sit on uncomfortably small airplane seats during long-haul travel.
abstract: Designers are creating fashionable compression socks, providing alternative to frumpy hosiery used to prevent swelling and puffiness in legs and ankles; compression socks are coming into vogue among stylish women who frequently take long-haul airplane flights.
lead_paragraph: Compression tights are beginning to come into vogue among stylish women who sit on uncomfortably small airplane seats during long-haul travel.

headline.main: Compression Socks and Hose Are No Longer for Grandma
headline.print_headline: Designers Ditch the Dowdy and Embrace the Functional
